last_episode_to_air.name: Grow Old Along with Me
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ex-cop Tom Harwood's happiness with his new bride is threatened by an old flame who sees an opportunity for blackmail.

name: In the Heat of the Night
original_name: In the Heat of the Night
overview: In the Heat of the Night is an American television series based on the motion picture and novel of the same name starring Carroll O'Connor as the white police chief William Gillespie, and Howard Rollins as the African-American police detective Virgil Tibbs. It was broadcast on NBC from 1988 until 1992, and then on CBS until 1995. Its executive producers were Fred Silverman, Juanita Bartlett and Carroll O'Connor. TGG Direct released the first season of the series to DVD on August 28, 2012.

episodes.name: Pilot (1)
episodes.overview: Virgil Tibbs returns to Sparta and joins the police force as chief of detectives.His arrival is  met with resistance from police chief Bill Gillespie - who resents having an officer hired without his approval.Virgil has trouble adjusting to the small, antiquated police force.Tibbs' first case is a racially charged murder case that is soon complicated when the suspect is murdered in his cell.

episodes.name: Pilot (2)
episodes.overview: The investigation into the brutal murders of a young girl and the suspect in her death, leads Tibbs and Gillespie to the son of one of Sparta's wealthiest and most influential citizens.As they come closer to the truth things become dangerous for Virgil.

episodes.name: Road Kill
episodes.overview: The affair between the husband of a wealthy woman and her distant cousin leads to her murder. Virgil immediately suspects the pair.But he has a difficult time persuading Gillespie, who is a long time friend of the man and Bubba, who has been seeing the cousin.Bubba and Virgil clash again and Virgil is frustrated when the Chief rejects his theory about the crime.

episodes.name: Fate
episodes.overview: Racial tensions run high when a married white woman has an affair with a black businessman from New York.Meanwhile Virgil is not happy when the Chief enlists his aid in tracking down Bubba's cousin, a suspected moonshiner.

episodes.name: Blind Spot (1)
episodes.overview: Virgil refuses to let go of a grudge against a wealthy former classmate who cheated him out of a scholarship.The man has promised city leaders that he will move his business to Sparta,but not all of his business interests are legal.The nephew of an old friend of Gillespie's finds his life in danger after he steals drugs stored in the businessman's mansion.

episodes.name: Blind Spot (2)
episodes.overview: An angry Gillespie seeks answers when an old friend is shot.And Virgil narrowly escapes death after trying to ascertain the real reason behind an old adversary's return to Sparta.Nan finds herself in danger after she finds out the truth about her new love.

episodes.name: A Necessary Evil
episodes.overview: In this humorous episode Virgil and the Chief arrest a man for bigamy.It soon becomes a polygamy case after an endless parade of wives come to visit their husband.

episodes.name: ...And Then You Die
episodes.overview: The Sparta police search for a killer and his girlfriend.But the case becomes personal when they take Althea and the grandson of one of the victims hostage.

episodes.name: Don't Look Back (1)
episodes.overview: A copycat recreates a shocking unsolved murder from the past.Gillespie feels threatened after Ted Marcus suggests that Virgil should become the Chief.The situation becomes more tense after Virgil criticizes Parker and Bubba's actions.

episodes.name: Don't Look Back (2)
episodes.overview: Tibbs,Gillespie and Bubba pursue different leads in a bizarre murder case and the Chief realizes that the killer has plans for him.

episodes.name: Family Secret
episodes.overview: The murder of well respected man turns up a shocking secret about his family.

episodes.name: The Hammer and the Glove
episodes.overview: Virgil is delighted when Matthew his former partner from Philidelphia comes to visit.But he soon learns his friend has another purpose for coming to Sparta.Althea is uncomfortable because she and Matthew were romantically involved before she met Virgil and she realizes that he is unwilling to accept the fact that she chose Virgil over him.Meanwhile the F.B.I. enlist Sparta P.D.'s aid in hiding a witness.

episodes.name: Prisoners
episodes.overview: Sweet risks his life to prove that the Sheriff of a neighboring county is guilty of the racially motivated murder of a young man that Sweet was friends with in high school.

episodes.name: Hot Nights
episodes.overview: Bubba is seduced by an alluring writer who has more on her mind than romance.Bill and Virgil worry that he is in over his head.Bubba tries to protect her from her estranged husband, but things get complicated after she shoots someone.

episodes.name: Gunshots
episodes.overview: Virgil is forced to shoot a suspect in an armed robbery.He has trouble dealing with the consequences of his actions, after he realizes the person he shot was a teenaged girl  - and no one can locate the gun he believed she was pointing at him.

episodes.name: Country Mouse, City Mouse
episodes.overview: Virgil's visiting niece and Bubba's nephew team up in an effort to escape the boredom of small town life.But they get more excitement than they bargained for when they cross paths with a dangerous parolee.

episodes.name: Stranger in Town
episodes.overview: Gillespie suspects that JoAnn's new cook is connected to the murder of a young prostitute.But Virgil suspects the culprit maybe a local pimp who has been intimidating the women.

episodes.name: Tear Down the Walls
episodes.overview: A minister who was integrating his church(by inviting Virgil and Althea to attend services)is poisoned.

episodes.name: A Trip Upstate
episodes.overview: In this thought provoking episode.Gillespie is surprised when a man he arrested asks to see him on the eve of his execution.He must confront his feelings about the death penalty when the prisoner asks him to witness his death.

episodes.name: A.k.a Kelly Kay
episodes.overview: The past comes back to haunt JoAnn in the form of an escaped convict.

episodes.name: Intruders
episodes.overview: The police search for a burglar who preys on elderly women.And the prime suspect is the son of a city councilwoman.

episodes.name: The Creek
episodes.overview: The investigation of a possible assault brings back nightmarish and confusing childhood memories for Virgil.

episodes.name: Sister, Sister
episodes.overview: A vivacious socialites return to Sparta delights her ailing father and childhood friend Virgil, but her sister is less than thrilled at her homecoming.After their father is poisoned the jealous siblings become suspects in his murder.

episodes.name: Walkout
episodes.overview: A bitter strike leads to a murder investigation on a snowy day in Sparta.

episodes.name: Accused
episodes.overview: Bubba tries to rescue a woman from a rapist, but she mistakes him for her attacker.Gillespie tangles with an ambitious district attorney who plans to use the case to further his career.

episodes.name: Fifteen, Forever
episodes.overview: Sparta grieves after a drunk driver causes a fatal crash with high school cheerleaders on their way home from a game.While the officers try to find other driver, Althea tries to help the victim's families deal with their loss. The accident brings back painful memories for retired officer Tom Dugan.Meanwhile, district attorney Dutton accuses the department of being inadequate.

episodes.name: Ladybug, Ladybug
episodes.overview: With the Chief in Quantico Bubba and Virgil try to catch a serial arsonist.Things get complicated after a man dies in one of the fires.And Councilwoman White stirs things up by appointing Tom Dugan acting chief of police in Gillespie's absence.

episodes.name: The Pig Woman of Sparta
episodes.overview: It seems that a serial killer has been burying his victims in a wooded area owned by a wealthy hermit that Virgil refers to as ""Sparta's  Howard Hughes"". Suspicion immediately falls on an eccentric woman who lives in the woods with her pigs and  chases away trespassers with a shotgun.The officers ask the landowner's disturbed son for help and Bubba is surprised to find that a woman he attended high school with is working as the man's ""nurse"".Also Parker and Sweet compete with one another to solve the case.

episodes.name: Rape
episodes.overview: After being released by his captors, the chief discovers that his abduction is part of a plot to assassinate a visiting civil rights leader.

episodes.name: Fairest of Them All
episodes.overview: Virgil struggles to help Althea after she is raped by a fellow teacher.Darnell does not think they can get a conviction because the man's wife has given him an alibi.Virgil tries to control his anger - until the man returns to intimidate Althea.And Gillespie tries to convince the wife to tell the truth.

episodes.name: Murder Most Ancient
episodes.overview: A beauty contest is marred by blackmail and the ambitious mother of a contestant.

episodes.name: First Girl
episodes.overview: An unhappy wife asks her lover to place a bomb in her abusive husband's truck.

episodes.name: Crackdown
episodes.overview: Sparta P.D. gets it's first black policewoman.

episodes.name: Anniversary
episodes.overview: Someone is selling crack to teenagers and Sweet tries desperately to save a young addict.

episodes.name: Time of the Stranger
episodes.overview: After a private investigator searching for a missing child is found dead, the evidence points to a local dance teacher - a neighbor that Parker has become very fond of.

episodes.name: Vengeance
episodes.overview: An outlaw family seeks revenge against Bubba after he is forced to shoot one of them during a holdup.The chief wants him to stay out of sight until they are arrested - a suggestion that does not set well with Bubba.

episodes.name: My Name is Hank
episodes.overview: A young refugee claims to be the son of a Sparta cop who died in the war.But quickly becomes a suspect in a murder/robbery after he accepts a ride with the criminals who actually committed the crime.Gillespie looks into his story, while Virgil and the boys track down the shooter.Meanwhile, the young mans presence triggers a surprisingly bitter reaction from  Parker, who views him as a painful reminder of the war.

episodes.name: King's Ransom
episodes.overview: The F.B.I. tries to talk an ex-boxer into testifying against a mobster he once worked for, but the fighter sees the situation as an opportunity for blackmail.

episodes.name: Epitaph for a Lady
episodes.overview: A long time friend of the Chief makes threats against a doctor he believes is responsible for his wife's death .When the doctor is killed he becomes the prime suspect.But Gillespie doubts his guilt - even after he confesses.

episodes.name: Triangle
episodes.overview: A man murders his wife and her lover after he catches them together,then flees to a remote cabin with his daughter who does not know what he has done.The chief and the boys hope to talk him into surrendering without resorting to violence.

episodes.name: Hello in There
episodes.overview: Bubba refuses to believe that a former teamate embezzled funds from the bank where he worked.And sets out to prove that his friend was framed and murdered.Harriet hopes that art therapy can help the man's traumatized son,who becomes a target himself when the killer realizes he witnessed the crime.

episodes.name: December Days
episodes.overview: The Sparta police investigate a suspicious death in a nursing home.

episodes.name: A Loss of Innocence
episodes.overview: Darnell plans on indicting a teenager for murder after her father is found in the basement and her mother turns up missing.But Gillespie and his men don't believe she is guilty.

episodes.name: Bubba's Baby
episodes.overview: Someone abandons a baby at Bubba's door.

episodes.name: Home is Where The Heart Is
episodes.overview: Maybelle the madam returns to Sparta with her "" nieces "".And sets up shop just out of Gillespie's jurisdiction.Her return is not without controversy and soon one of her most vocal critics is found murdered.

episodes.name: An Angry Woman
episodes.overview: First the mother,then the father of two young children are murdered.Althea takes responsibility for the children. The killings appear to be related to a shady trucking firm.

episodes.name: Indiscretions
episodes.overview: Althea does not realize that an old friend from Philly is hiding a dark secret, nor does Sweet who has fallen in love with the  woman.

episodes.name: Night of the Killing
episodes.overview: Racial tensions run high when a white cabbie is murdered in the bottoms.

episodes.name: Citizen Trundel (1)
episodes.overview: Harriet's sister is murdered on the orders of the wealthy white man who fathered her child.

episodes.name: Citizen Trundel (2)
episodes.overview: Harriet's efforts to bring V.J. Trundel to trial are fruitless.The Chief does not believe they will ever get enough evidence to get an indictment,so he tries another method to bring Trundel to justice.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love (1)
episodes.overview: Virgil goes to Philadelphia to investigate a friends death.And Bubba (reluctantly) fills in as Althea's Lamaze coach.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love (2)
episodes.overview: Virgil is framed for murder and Gillespie travels to Philly to help him clear his name.

episodes.name: Lessons Learned
episodes.overview: Gillespie sends Parker to confirm suspicions that a local truck stop is really a front for a prostitution business.When a young prostitute is found dead Gillespie is shocked at her fathers reaction.Parker is dismayed when he recognizes one of the ladies.

episodes.name: Perversions of Justice
episodes.overview: A mild mannered school teacher is accused of child molestation.

episodes.name: And Justice For Some
episodes.overview: Gillespie and his officers are outraged when a drug courier who ran down the son of Virgil's next door neighbor makes a deal with the F.B.I. to avoid prosecution.

episodes.name: Hearts of Gold
episodes.overview: Bubba is reunited with his high school sweetheart, but his happiness is short lived after she resorts to murder to silence an attorney who was threatening to stop her from inheriting her late husband's estate.

episodes.name: Quick Fix
episodes.overview: The investigation into the death of an abandoned infant leads to a mentally handicapped teenager.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: A lawyer has personal reasons for trying to gain early release for a man who was sent to prison after an accident he caused while drinking and driving.

episodes.name: A Problem Too Personal
episodes.overview: Harriet and Eugene are devastated after Gene's father is arrested for murder.

episodes.name: A Final Arrangement
episodes.overview: Sweet is heartbroken when an elderly woman who befriended him is murdered in her bookstore.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: Virgil's dream of a better relationship with his Aunt Ruda and her son is shattered when his cousin takes part in a string of burglaries that result in murder.

episodes.name: Bounty Hunter
episodes.overview: Gillespie receives word that a former Spartan is wanted for the murder of a socialite in Houston.But a ruthless bounty hunter, sent by the victim's jealous husband is already in Sparta and sees the man's sister as a means to locate his quarry.

episodes.name: Blessings
episodes.overview: In this Christmas episode the officers share memories with a reporter from the Sparta Herald.

episodes.name: Shine on Sparta Moon
episodes.overview: A bottle of spiked moonshine leads to an accident that claims the life of one teen and blinds another.

episodes.name: Execution of Trust
episodes.overview: A psychiatrist tells Gillespie that one of her patients has confessed to a crime that another man is about to be executed for, but she refuses to divulge his identity.

episodes.name: Child of Promise
episodes.overview: A story of two brothers one an honor student that Althea has great plans for, the other a dangerous drug dealer as they struggle to influence a younger sibling.

episodes.name: Paper Castles
episodes.overview: Virgil soon regrets telling an old friend that his new business partners are being investigated by the police.

episodes.name: Laid to Waste
episodes.overview: Parker protects a blind woman who heard her neighbors murder.

episodes.name: First Deadly Sin
episodes.overview: A serial rapist stalks Sparta.

episodes.name: Just A Country Boy
episodes.overview: Bubba travels to Los Angeles to arrest an arsonist.When the man is murdered to keep him from talking Bubba teams up with a pretty insurance investigator to solve the crime.

episodes.name: No Other Road
episodes.overview: Harriet tries to keep Eugene from giving up when his father faces the death penalty.And the police search for three suspects in connection to a robbery/murder.

episodes.name: A Turning
episodes.overview: Althea thinks Virgil needs a new line of work after seeing the aftermath of a deadly shooting at a roadhouse.Virgil finds himself in danger when they arrest the man who committed the crime.

episodes.name: A Woman Much Admired
episodes.overview: Gillespie's old flame returns to Sparta to settle some business matters and see Bill. When she is murdered he travels to Gulfport and meets his daughter Lana for the first time.

episodes.name: Baby for Sale
episodes.overview: After Bubba's cousin adopts a baby her husband is blackmailed by the child's real parents - they want him to help them steal the payroll where he works.

episodes.name: Obsession
episodes.overview: A flirtatious schoolteacher is stalked by a madman.

episodes.name: Liar's Poker
episodes.overview: A game of high stakes poker ends in murder.

episodes.name: Ruda's Awakening
episodes.overview: Virgil's Aunt Ruda is the only witness to a struggle between Bubba and a young robbery suspect that ends in the young mans death.But her prejudice against the police -- and Virgil clouds her memory of the incident.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: Bubba returns to Los Angeles to testify at a murder trial and is reunited with Pat Day as they try to protect Mike from killers sent to prevent him from testifying.

episodes.name: The More Thing's Change
episodes.overview: A man murders his business partner and frames the man's illegitimate daughter for the crime in an attempt to gain the man's business and his wife.

episodes.name: Sweet, Sweet Blues
episodes.overview: The lyrics to a blues song recall a murder that happened 50 years earlier.The victim - Sweet's grandfather.And the only people left with the answers are the bluesman who wrote the song and a retired sheriff.

episodes.name: Sparta Gold
episodes.overview: A deputy provides protection for a cotton grower who is running a pot growing operation.But the deputy makes a big mistake when he wounds Bubba's girlfriend.

episodes.name: An Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: The father of a man Gerard prosecuted kidnaps the DA's daughter.

episodes.name: The Littlest Victim
episodes.overview: Lonnie makes a heartbreaking discovery about a woman he dated in high school.

episodes.name: The Landlord
episodes.overview: A drug dealing slumlord is murdered by his accomplices.

episodes.name: Fool for Love
episodes.overview: A doctor plots to eliminate his wife -- and his mistress.

episodes.name: Love, Honor and Obey
episodes.overview: Parkers investigation into a purse snatching reveals an abused woman.

episodes.name: Odessa
episodes.overview: Racists target a ceremony honoring a civil rights pioneer.

episodes.name: A Time to Trust
episodes.overview: Althea fears for one of her students after her mother's boyfriend is linked to a criminal operation that has resulted in the deaths of several truckers.

episodes.name: By Means Most Foul
episodes.overview: A restaurateur and her mechanic boyfriend plot to eliminate her husband, but their scheme backfires.Gillespie takes heat over a string of mailbox bashings.And Virgil soon regrets ignoring Parker's theory regarding where the vandals would strike next.

episodes.name: Trundel's Will Be Done
episodes.overview: V.J. Trundel's widow takes Harriet to court to gain custody of Eric.But Harriet is determined that her nephew will not be raised in the home of the man who ordered the murder of her sister.

episodes.name: Moseley's Lot
episodes.overview: Gillespie learns that the son of an old friend is a compulsive gambler.The young man wants his father to pay off his losses.But when two gangsters show up from New Orleans to collect, his jealous sibling sees the perfect opportunity to get rid of his troubled brother.

episodes.name: Family Reunion
episodes.overview: An ex-convict attempts to retrieve his loot from his wife and her new husband in this tongue-in-cheek episode.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: A political prisoner who entered the country illegally,seeks sanctuary in a monastary.Gillespie and Tibbs find themselves at odds with Sheriff McComb when they try to help the man.

episodes.name: The Law on Trial
episodes.overview: Gillespie,Tibbs and Father DiMarco must stand trial for harbouring a fugitive and obstructing justice.

episodes.name: A Small War (1)
episodes.overview: Big city crack dealers invade Sparta.Eugene witnesses the drive by shooting of a friend and his offer to help the police identify the shooters leaves Harriet frightened and angry at Bill.

episodes.name: A Small War (2)
episodes.overview: The police wage war against the big city drug dealers who have moved into Sparta.Eugene identifies the men who murdered his friend.And Bubba is teamed with and intrigued by a lady police lieutenant from Jackson.

episodes.name: Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Louann's ne'er-do-well brother returns home after being paroled.

episodes.name: A Frenzied Affair
episodes.overview: Althea places herself in harms way trying to help one of her students, a disturbed and violent young man; after he is implicated in a murder case.

episodes.name: Discovery
episodes.overview: Althea has trouble dealing with the violent death of a student.Young Megan Fowler quickly finds herself yet another dangerous boyfriend and they are soon wanted by the police.

episodes.name: Random's Child
episodes.overview: Lana Gillespie comes to Sparta to claim her inheritance,but is stalked by a mobster who dated her mother.Meanwhile Harriet encourages Bill to talk to his daughter,but Lana doesn't seem to be interested.Officer Randy Goode helps keep the bad guys at bay by playing them a little tune on the guitar.

episodes.name: An Occupational Hazard
episodes.overview: A secretary takes drastic measures to protect herself from sexual harassment.

episodes.name: Last Rites
episodes.overview: Virgil fears for his Aunt Ruda's safety after several killings occur in the hospital where she is being treated.

episodes.name: When the Music Stopped
episodes.overview: Singer Eddie Larran returns to Sparta for a concert,but not everyone is a fan.An angry man insists that Eddie owes him money.And their dispute soon ends in violence.

episodes.name: Flowers from a Lady
episodes.overview: A city councilwoman becomes dangerously obsessed with Bubba.

episodes.name: Private Sessions
episodes.overview: One of Virgil's classmates from law school is arrested following the death of his former girlfriend, but the man insists that her death was the result of her relationship with her psychiatrist.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: A judge schemes to get rid of his wife after she tries to blackmail him into giving her a divorce and a generous settlement by revealing a secret from his past.

episodes.name: Falsely Accused
episodes.overview: Sweet is the target of false accusations by two corrupt and racist car salesmen.

episodes.name: A Step Removed
episodes.overview: Parker's stepfather Roy threatens his former employer after an altercation.When the boss is murdered Roy is arrested.

episodes.name: A Deadly Affection
episodes.overview: A woman asks Harriet to help her get an eviction order rescinded.The chief gives Parker a new radar gun - and soon comes to regret it.Sheriff McComb requests that Gillespie and Bubba help investigate a murder.Meanwhile Lonnie and Luann search for the boy who reported the murder.

episodes.name: The Leftover Man (1)
episodes.overview: A white supremacist politician plans to have his wife's lover murdered and blame it on black radicals.

episodes.name: The Leftover Man (2)
episodes.overview: A white supremacist politician plans to have his wife's lover murdered and blame it on black radicals.

episodes.name: A Dish Best Served Cold
episodes.overview: A swindlers homecoming upsets his wife and the families of his victims - especially Etta.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: A wealthy man plans to grant a promise made to a black sharecropper many years ago by giving land to the man's descendant.But his greedy son disapproves.

episodes.name: Even Nice People
episodes.overview: Corrupt developers set their sights on Lana's farm. When she refuses to sell they enlist the services of an arsonist to force her out.

episodes.name: Lake Winahatchie
episodes.overview: Bill discovers the motivation behind a crime syndicates attempt to muscle in on Sparta and the reason they are determined to get Lana's land.

episodes.name: A Correct Settling
episodes.overview: Eugene hopes a well known minister can save his father from Death Row.But someone runs the Reverend off the road on his way into town and the Sparta police try to protect him and track down his assailent.Meanwhile Harriet struggles with what her part in her ex-husbands appeal should be and is even more unsettled when Eugene demands that she break up with Bill.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.overview: Chief Gillespie is fired by the city council and Sparta's new police chief Hampton Forbes arrives in town.Bill's last case with Sparta P.D. is a murder investigation in which a young boy has been implicated.

episodes.name: Hatton's Turn (1)
episodes.overview: Hampton Forbes assumes the office of Chief of Police and Bill becomes the Sheriff of Newman county.Former Spartan Wade Hatton returns to Sparta hoping to make sense of his life and rekindle his relationship with Sarah Hallisey.Bubba and Covey take the new chief on a tour of Sparta and Bill takes Wade to visit some distant cousins.Meanwhile two young criminals involve a mentally handicapped young man in a terrible crime.

episodes.name: Hatton's Turn (2)
episodes.overview: Wade and Sarah try to keep young Henry from being punished for a crime he did not commit and Forbes and his officers search for the two men who are really responsible.

episodes.name: A Depraved Heart
episodes.overview: The daughter of an old friend asks Bubba to arrest the man who knowingly gave her AIDS.

episodes.name: Incident at Brewer's Pond
episodes.overview: A night of revelry at a local pond turns deadly.

episodes.name: A Love Lost
episodes.overview: Lana's ex- boyfriend comes to see her and brings a load of stolen rifles with him.

episodes.name: Singin' the Blues
episodes.overview: Luann moonlights as a singer at a nightclub and finds romance with the clubs owner.Her happiness is shortlived when she realizes that the bartender is dealing drugs.

episodes.name: Virgil Tibbs, Attorney at Law
episodes.overview: Attorney Virgil Tibbs returns to Sparta and is soon assigned his first case as a defense attorney.

episodes.name: Every Man's Family
episodes.overview: Bubba travels to Atlanta to help his nephew after the boy overdoses on drugs.He soon teams up with a street wise cop to take down the drug ring.

episodes.name: A Baby Called Rocket
episodes.overview: A neglected baby stirs maternal feelings in Luann.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: Tragic story of an alcoholic teen who accidentally kills a little girl while she is drinking and driving.

episodes.name: Good Cop, Bad Cop
episodes.overview: Virgil defends Parker after he is falsely accused of police brutality by a drug dealer.The prosecution's main witness - the man's girlfriend, who was once engaged to Parker.

episodes.name: Maybelle Returns
episodes.overview: Maybelle's new phone sex business is a great success - until one her girls decides to moonlight as a prostitute.

episodes.name: The Last Round
episodes.overview: Forbes is delighted when his fiancee Angela comes to see him,but is disappointed when he realizes that they have very different plans for the future.

episodes.name: Ches and the Grand Lady
episodes.overview: Lonnie must protect his  Aunt Cordelia when her cherished friendship with Ches Collins angers one of his cousins.

episodes.name: Conspiracy of One
episodes.overview: Virgil accepts a position at a prominent law firm.But as a former police officer he feels conflicting emotions when he realizes that one of their clients is guilty of murder.

episodes.name: The Rabbi
episodes.overview: A Rabbi returns to Sparta after many years.Racists vandalize his synagogue and soon after their Torah is stolen.Forbes investigates but the Rabbi refuses to trust Bill because of his inaction while investigating a hate crime many years ago.

episodes.name: Hard Choices
episodes.overview: Eugene tries to protect a friend who was an unwilling accomplice to a robbery and in doing so endangers his probation -- and his life.

episodes.name: Time's Long Shadow
episodes.overview: Harriet tries to stop an arrogant developer from destroying an important archeological site.

episodes.name: Poor Relations
episodes.overview: Comedic episode in which Parker's ne'er-do-well stepfather returns to Sparta with a new wife, a stolen painting and two inept art thieves who are determined to steal the painting back.

episodes.name: Dangerous Engagement
episodes.overview: Bill and Harriet's wedding plans are interrupted by a sniper who mistakes Bill for Sheriff McComb.

episodes.name: In the Heat of the Night: Give Me Your Life
episodes.overview: In the Heat of the Night: Give Me Your Life is a film directed by Russ Mayberry released on May 11, 1994.

episodes.name: Give Me Your Life (2)
episodes.overview: Bill and Harriet return home.The cult kidnaps the girl from her foster home.And Forbes and his men arrest a man who has been supplying drugs used to keep the cult members under control.Soon a standoff develops and the officers realize that they have no intention of surrendering.Sarah is taken hostage.As they attempt to rescue the women and children Lonnie and Parker find themselves defusing a bomb and Bubba risks his life to rescue a small child from the building.

episodes.name: In the Heat of the Night: A Matter of Justice
episodes.overview: In the Heat of the Night: A Matter of Justice is a film directed by Reza Badiyi released on Oct 21, 1994.

episodes.name: Who Was Geli Bendl ?
episodes.overview: A famous Italian actress returns to Sparta to take care of some unfinished business and rescue her younger sister from a life of drugs and poverty.

episodes.name: By Duty Bound
episodes.overview: Acting Sheriff Gillespie must decide whether he should run for sheriff or retire from law enforcement.It soon becomes apparent that the other candidate is corrupt and dangerous.

episodes.name: Grow Old Along with Me
episodes.overview: Ex-cop Tom Harwood's happiness with his new bride is threatened by an old flame who sees an opportunity for blackmail.
